alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 3:16PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Gulf and northwestern Franklin Counties through 345 PM EDT/245 PM CDT/... At 315 PM EDT/215 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Apalachicola, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Apalachicola, Nine Mile, Buck Siding, Bay City, Apalachicola Airport, Creels, Tilton, Beverly and Hays Place. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf
